attributes.action: Be interviewed by Jon Gaunt live on talk sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This could be in the form of a studio interview or phone interview.
The British public would also be able to ask Mr Brown questions via a phone in.
The duration of the aforementioned interview would be 60 minutes = 3600 seconds.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
